Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/58th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Garfield, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Garfield, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/58th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Kimball. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Kimball.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
